Package com.google.code.rees.scope.conversation

Class Summary
ConversationAdapter This class is used to adapt/integrate the major components of the conversation management to control frameworks such as Struts2 and Spring MVC or any other framework.
ConversationConstants Constants used for conversation management
ConversationUtil Provides static methods intended primarily for use internally and in unit testing.
